typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SourceTable as string,
	WaterMarkField as string
}
source(output(
		customer_Id as string,
		DOB as string,
		Gender as string,
		city_code as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Created_Modified_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[($SourceTable)]) ~> source1
ConditionalSplit1@Customer aggregate(Max_Created_Modified_Date = max(toTimestamp(toString(byName($WaterMarkField)),'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm'))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(TableName = $SourceTable) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(isNull(Max_Created_Modified_Date)==false())) ~> AlterRow1
source1 split(equals($SourceTable,'Customer.csv'),
	equals($SourceTable,'Transactions.csv'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Customer, Transactions)
ConditionalSplit1@Transactions aggregate(Max_Tran_Date = max(toTimestamp(toString(byName($WaterMarkField)),'dd-MM-yyyy'))) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate2 derive(TableName = $SourceTable) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(updateIf(isNull(Max_Tran_Date)==false())) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		Source as string,
		Source_Table as string,
		Dest_Table as string,
		Columns as string,
		Watermark_Column as string,
		Watermark_Value as timestamp,
		Enabled as boolean,
		Load_Flag as string,
		Status as string,
		Comment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Dest_Table'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Dest_Table = TableName,
		Watermark_Value = Max_Created_Modified_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
AlterRow2 sink(input(
		Source as string,
		Source_Table as string,
		Dest_Table as string,
		Columns as string,
		Watermark_Column as string,
		Watermark_Value as timestamp,
		Enabled as boolean,
		Load_Flag as string,
		Status as string,
		Comment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Dest_Table'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Dest_Table = TableName,
		Watermark_Value = Max_Tran_Date
	),
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
